sections.title: 1. Purpose
sections.content: These Terms and Conditions of Use ("T&Cs") define the rights and obligations of users of the Linguify application, a language learning platform accessible via subscription. Linguify is a product created by GPI Software that aims to improve language education.

sections.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By registering on Linguify and using the application, the user acknowledges having read these T&Cs and agrees to abide by them.

sections.title: 3. Access and Use
sections.content: Linguify is accessible via a monthly subscription of €10. Access to services is personal and non-transferable. The user is responsible for the confidentiality of their credentials.

sections.title: 4. Subscription and Payment
sections.content:
Pricing: The Linguify subscription is charged at €10 per month. Payments are made online via secure payment methods offered on the platform.

Renewal and Termination: The subscription is automatically renewed each month unless terminated by the user before the due date.

Right of Withdrawal: In accordance with Article L.221-28 of the Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal does not apply to the supply of immediately accessible digital content.

sections.title: 5. Responsibilities
sections.content:
Linguify's Responsibility: Linguify commits to ensuring the accessibility and proper functioning of its service but cannot be held responsible for interruptions, technical failures, or data loss.

User's Responsibility: The user agrees not to use Linguify for fraudulent, illegal purposes or in ways contrary to these T&Cs.

sections.title: 6. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content present on the Linguify application, including but not limited to texts, images, videos, and software, is created and managed by Linguify, a product of GPI Software. They are protected by intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or use is prohibited without the prior consent of Linguify.

sections.title: 7. Personal Data Protection
sections.content: Linguify collects and processes user personal data in accordance with its Privacy Policy, available on the site.

sections.title: 8. Modification of T&Cs
sections.content: Linguify reserves the right to modify these T&Cs. The user will be informed of modifications by any appropriate means.

sections.title: 9. Applicable Law and Disputes
sections.content: These T&Cs are subject to French law. Any dispute falls under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in the jurisdiction of Linguify's headquarters.

sections.title: 10. Contact
sections.content: For any questions regarding the T&Cs, the user can contact Linguify at the following address: support@linguify.com.
